description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(104).
links: Vincenzo Librandi and Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100 (first 81 terms from Vincenzo Librandi).
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,102,0,-1).
